Html:
Hello,
I've done a Php script that exports products data from a MySql database to MsExcel using this useful PHPExcel class, everything is fine except for the description field. This usually is a very long text and when I add this with getActiveSheet()->setCellValue I get only a part of the entire text ( I tried to count how many chars it writes, but my excel doesn't recognize the LEN function... maybe you can help me with this issue as well.. ) . So, what do I have to do to write the entire 'description' product field inside the cell?
Thank you for help.
Bye!
Please check http://visio.mvps.org/Excel_2007.htm for Excel 2003 and Excel 2007 limitations.

Thank You,
this was very useful, I've found the ptoblem:

'The number of characters that can be stored and displayed in a cell formatted as Text => 255'

So, is it possible to change the cell format from the actual 'text' to any other kind of format?
Thank you again.
Bye

I think so,
the problem is I don't know what to do :)
Do you know what I have to do if I want to convert a cell to Rich Text Format?
Thank you
Check example 05featuredemo.inc.php, this has some examples of creating rich text.

i want the same thing i.e. want to apply "Text" format rather than "General" format
not for any single cell but for whole sheet
if i apply it cell by cell the page dies out of timeout
any thing possible here?

thanks,
Sam
